name: Ajani Vengeant
text: +1: Target permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.\n−2: Ajani Vengeant deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.\n−7: Destroy all lands target player controls.

name: Kird Ape
text: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
flavor: Apes can be gentle, contemplative beasts—but context is everything.

name: Essence Warden
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor: "The more our numbers grow, the more I gain hope that Volrath and his cursed stronghold will one day fall."\n—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Wild Nacatl
text: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.\nWild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.
flavor: "The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."

name: Loam Lion
text: Loam Lion gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
flavor: In Zendikar, today's grassland could be tomorrow's jungle, and hunting grounds change as quickly as the weather.

name: Canyon Wildcat
text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor: "Relative of yours?" Ertai teased. Mirri simply sneered.

name: Jade Mage
text: {2}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: "We are one with the wild things. Life blooms from our fingertips and nature responds to our summons."\n—Jade creed

name: Sylvan Ranger
text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

name: Ajani's Pridemate
text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.
flavor: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."\n—Jazal Goldmane

name: Qasali Pridemage
text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)\n{1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

name: Grazing Gladehart
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.
flavor: "Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago."\n—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

name: Fleetfoot Panther
text: Flash\nWhen Fleetfoot Panther enters the battlefield, return a green or white creature you control to its owner's hand.

name: Woolly Thoctar
flavor: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.

name: Briarhorn
text: Flash\nWhen Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.\nEvoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Loxodon Hierarch
text: When Loxodon Hierarch enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.\n{G}{W}, Sacrifice Loxodon Hierarch: Regenerate each creature you control.
flavor: "I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it."

name: Spitemare
text: Whenever Spitemare is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player.
flavor: "I knew a creature carved from a dream of wild freedom. Any attempt to leash or exploit it failed, and at terrible cost."\n—Ashling

name: Marisi's Twinclaws
text: Double strike
flavor: "Looks like we're completely outnumbered."\n"Lucky for us. I thought we'd be bored."

name: Ageless Entity
text: Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Ageless Entity.
flavor: Tel-Jilad's sworn protectors are the trolls, yet more fearsome protectors were created by the Tangle itself.

name: Pride of Lions
text: You may have Pride of Lions assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
flavor: There's only one thing worse than a hungry lion—many hungry lions.

name: Nacatl Hunt-Pride
text: Vigilance\n{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.\n{G}, {T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.
flavor: "We must hunt and kill the dragon before it can return to raze our ancient city."

name: Firemane Angel
text: Flying, first strike\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.\n{6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Ajani's Mantra
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.
flavor: "He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence."\n—Zaliki of Naya

name: Lightning Helix
text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
flavor: "Rage is not the answer. Rage followed by fitting vengeance is the answer."\n—Ajani

name: Lead the Stampede
text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Griffin Guide
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.\nWhen enchanted creature dies, put a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

name: Recumbent Bliss
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.
flavor: Kithkin somnomancers enjoy the peaceful dreams wafting from their victims.

name: Searing Meditation
text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: "When I meditate I see the world as it should be. All that does not fit, I remove."\n—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

name: Behemoth Sledge
text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink and trample.\nEquip {3}
flavor: "May this grant you all the strength of the behemoths and none of their serenity."\n—Ajani

name: Naya Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Naya Charm deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Return target card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.
• Tap all creatures target player controls.
flavor: Deep in nature's core lies a potential unsullied by greed or civilization.

name: Sylvan Bounty
text: Target player gains 8 life.\nBasic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
flavor: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

name: Titanic Ultimatum
text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +5/+5 and gain first strike, lifelink, and trample.
flavor: "Retribution is best delivered by claws and rage, with both magnified."\n—Ajani

name: Evolving Wilds
text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.

name: Graypelt Refuge
text: Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.\n{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

name: Jungle Shrine
text: Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W} to your mana pool.
flavor: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.

name: Kazandu Refuge
text: Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.\n{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

name: Sapseep Forest
text: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)\nSapseep Forest enters the battlefield tapped.\n{G}, {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more green permanents.

name: Vitu-Ghazi, the City-Tree
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{2}{G}{W}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: In the autumn, she casts her seeds across the streets below, and come spring, her children rise in service to the Conclave.

name: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker
text: +3: Destroy target noncreature permanent.\n−2: Gain control of target creature.\n−9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player. That player discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

name: Surveilling Sprite
text: Flying\nWhen Surveilling Sprite dies, you may draw a card.
flavor: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.

name: Nightscape Familiar
text: Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.\n{1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.
flavor: Nightscape masters don't stop at raising the spirit of a fallen battlemage. They raise the flesh along with it.

name: Slavering Nulls
text: Whenever Slavering Nulls deals combat damage to a player, if you control a Swamp, you may have that player discard a card.
flavor: Having lost their minds, they now want yours.

name: Brackwater Elemental
text: When Brackwater Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.\nUnearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Morgue Toad
text: Sacrifice Morgue Toad: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.
flavor: "The toads of Urborg aren't fast, powerful, or pleasant, but they have their uses."\n—Ertai

name: Hellfire Mongrel
text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Hellfire Mongrel deals 2 damage to him or her.
flavor: There is no fondness between the hound and its master. There is only a common appreciation of the hunt.

name: Dimir Cutpurse
text: Whenever Dimir Cutpurse deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.
flavor: Other guilds demand tolls from those who travel their territories, but not House Dimir. It takes its share secretly, one coin purse at a time.

name: Steamcore Weird
text: When Steamcore Weird enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast Steamcore Weird, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Like many Izzet creations, weirds are based on wild contradictions yet somehow manage to work.

name: Moroii
text: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.
flavor: "Touched by moroii"\n—Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

name: Blazing Specter
text: Flying, haste\nWhenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

name: Fire-Field Ogre
text: First strike\nUnearth {U}{B}{R} ({U}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Shriekmaw
text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)\nWhen Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.\nEvoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Ogre Savant
text: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if {U} was spent to cast Ogre Savant, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: He's an oxymoron.

name: Jhessian Zombies
text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)\nIslandcycling {2}, swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Igneous Pouncer
text: Haste\nSwampcycling {2}, mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Vapor Snag
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor: "This creature is inadequate. Send it to the splicers for innovation."\n—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

name: Countersquall
text: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor: "The essence of every world, every spell, and every thought is power. Nothing else matters, because nothing else exists."\n—Nicol Bolas

name: Obelisk of Grixis
text: {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.
flavor: Like most features of Grixis, the obelisks that remain from the time of Alara now exist only for dark exploitation.

name: Recoil
text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.
flavor: Anything sent into a plagued world is bound to come back infected.

name: Undermine
text: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.
flavor: "Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"

name: Grixis Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "So many choices. Shall I choose loathing, hate, or malice today?"\n—Eliza of the Keep

name: Icy Manipulator
text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
flavor: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life. In ice there is perfect tranquility, perfect order, and the silence of death.

name: Deep Analysis
text: Target player draws two cards.\nFlashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: "No fact escapes me. Why do you think you can?"

name: Agonizing Demise
text: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)\nDestroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If Agonizing Demise was kicked, it deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

name: Slave of Bolas
text: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

name: Elder Mastery
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying.\nWhenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, that player discards two cards.
flavor: Taste his power, hunger for his command.

name: Cruel Ultimatum
text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.
flavor: There is always a greater power.

name: Profane Command
text:
Choose two —
• Target player loses X life. 
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
• Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Spite
text: Counter target noncreature spell.

name: Malice
text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Pain
text: Target player discards a card.

name: Suffering
text: Destroy target land.

name: Rise
text: Return target creature card from a graveyard and target creature on the battlefield to their owners' hands.

name: Fall
text: Target player reveals two cards at random from his or her hand, then discards each nonland card revealed this way.

name: Crumbling Necropolis
text: Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.
flavor: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living."\n—Olcot, Rider of Joffik

name: Rupture Spire
text: Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

name: Terramorphic Expanse
text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.
